attributes.action: force dog owners to microchip and vacinate [where possible] all animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is web site after web site on the internet for people who have lost their animals. There is hardly a day goes by when I personally do not hear of one or another animal missing, even our local paper has set asside a regular spot for missing animals. We believe compulsary micro chipping would help return lost animals to their owners and that when they do, anual vacinations help to keep desease to a minimum.
